SELECT u.id AS user_id, u.username, u.nickname, ss.sign_id, ss.ip, ss.create_time, ss.id, ss.status from lin_user AS u, student_sign AS ss WHERE u.id = ss.user_id AND ss.sign_id = #{signId} AND ss.status = 1

SELECT u.id AS user_id, u.username, u.nickname, ss.sign_id, ss.ip, ss.create_time, ss.`status` FROM lin_user AS u LEFT JOIN student_sign AS ss ON u.id = ss.user_id WHERE u.id IN ( SELECT sc.user_id FROM student_class AS sc WHERE sc.class_id = ( SELECT sl.class_id from sign_list AS sl WHERE sl.id = #{signId} ) ) AND ss.sign_id = #{signId}
AND (u.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%') OR u.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%'))
UNION SELECT u.id AS user_id, u.username, u.nickname, null AS sign_id, null AS ip, null AS create_time, 0 AS `status` FROM lin_user AS u WHERE u.id NOT IN ( SELECT ssi.user_id FROM student_sign AS ssi WHERE ssi.sign_id = #{signId} ) AND u.id IN ( SELECT sc.user_id from student_class AS sc WHERE sc.class_id = ( SELECT sl.class_id from sign_list AS sl WHERE sl.id = #{signId} ) )
AND (u.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%') OR u.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%'))
ORDER BY `ip`
DESC
